data.title: Sonia Agarwal debuts in Khushboo's telly soap
data.meta_description: Sonia's new TV show, Naanal, will be produced by Khushboo, for Kalaignar TV. Khushboo has written the story as well.
data.text:
After her marriage to director-actor Sundar C, Khushboo has moved from the big screen to the small screen rather successfully.Â Besides acting in television serials, the actress also produces them.

Joining her on TV is another film actress Sonia Agarwal. Sonia starred in Selvaraghavan's big hit Kadhal Kondein opposite Dhanush.Â She went on to act in Selvaraghavan's next two films and eventually got married to him and quit films.

Her new TV show, Naanal, will be produced by Khushboo, for Kalaignar TV. Khushboo has written the story as well.

Robert Rajasekar -- the man who directed blockbusters like Chinna Poovae Mella Pesu, Palaivana Cholai and Manasukkul Mathapoo -- will make his debut as a TV show director.

Sonia will play Radhika, who is like a naanal (creeper) -- no adversity can destroy her or her spirit. Even after losing her husband, she successfully withstands many a storm that blows into her life, and helps people so that she can live a happy and peaceful life.
